name: A Day with Yaga
description:
A Day with Yaga is a collection and exploration based game, where the player controls a crow called Yaga going about their daily tasks. With a sense of intimacy and warmth contrasting the frigid landscape, immerse yourself into Yaga’s quaint world. Go about your daily tasks, while exploring the environment to find resources and discover hidden secrets amongst the snowy tundra. 

This game was created in less than two weeks for a university project. 

Creators:

Michaela Bussey: Communication design, project management
Jodi Chapson: Programming
Daniel Burke: Art assets and textures
